## DataSource.getDataZoomLevel() method

Computes the data zoom level to use.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getDataZoomLevel(zoomLevel: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  zoomLevel | number | The zoom level of the \[\[MapView\]\]. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

The data zoom level to use.
